channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: Open Season
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Edward Anhalt)
item.description: Shots in the night, vegetables in the coal bin, dynamite in the potatoes, women in uniform! That's West Point; that's war; that's what it means when saboteurs go all out …
